summary: WHILE DRIVING  IN THE RAIN, THE VEHICLE SPLASHED WATER FROM THE FRONT TIRES  OVER THE HOOD ONTO THE WINDSHIELD, CAUSING CONSUMER TO LOSE VISIBILITY.  THE CONSUMER STATED WATER SHOULD SPLASH TO THE SIDE OF VEHICLE NOT OVER THE HOOD OF VEHICLE.   *AK   TOYOTA WAS AWARE  OF THE PROBLEM.   *SCC  *JB
